title: Revised confidence interval of dead standing trees

content.description: A biologist studying trees constructed the confidence interval <math alttext="0.14 comma 0.20" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.14</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> to estimate the proportion of trees in a large forest that are dead but still standing. Using the same confidence level, the interval was later revised because the sample proportion had been miscalculated. The correct sample proportion was <math alttext="0.27" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>0.27</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>.
content.question: Which of the following statements about the revised interval based on the correct sample proportion is true?

choices.label: The revised interval is narrower than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is farther from <math alttext="0.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> than the miscalculated proportion is.

The revised interval is narrower than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is closer to <math alttext="0.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> than the miscalculated proportion is.

The revised interval is wider than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is farther from <math alttext="0.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> than the miscalculated proportion is.

The revised interval is wider than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is closer to <math alttext="0.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> than the miscalculated proportion is.
The revised interval has the same width as the original interval.

content.answer: The revised interval is wider than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is closer to <math alttext="0.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> than the miscalculated proportion is.
